Usage Policy
The material on the website cannot be duplicated, replicated, published, downloaded, distributed, posted, transmitted, shared, made accessible, or employed in any manner other than for personal, non-commercial purposes.
Additionally, you are required to refrain from modifying, changing, or generating derivative works from any content unless it is for personal, non-commercial purposes. For any usage of the content beyond personal purposes, it is necessary to obtain prior approval from the affiliated Centers communication office, and any breach of the previously mentioned exclusive rights may lead to legal action being taken.
